articles.title: AAVAS Q2 Result
articles.content:
Sales rises by 15% from 542 to 627 Cr (YoY basis).
Net profit rises by 10% from 126 to 139 Cr (YoY basis).
Net interest income (measure of a bank’s profitability from core operations) grew by 14% from 245 to 278 Cr

articles.title: AAVAS Q1 Result
articles.content:
Sales rises by 15% from 579 to 667 Cr (YoY basis).
Net profit rises by 11% from 148 to 164 Cr (YoY basis).
Net interest income (measure of a bank’s profitability from core operations) grew by 19% from 241 to 288 Cr
